(Icedemon, your latest post, "The Last Hope" was a mode.  It was a very big 
mode.  Doing some of the qualities your infamous for.  You magically knew 
where Spitfire, Hot Rod, and Savanna were.  Now, it may seem like I'm just 
sore about possibly losing that battle, but that is not the case.
    I am angry, that you magically found the Maximals and Predacons fighting. 
 I'm surprised that you magically appeared there.  You didn't scan or 
anything.  Redo that post immediately)


Lord Unitron
